Program.Name: RamDebugger
Program.ShortDescription: RamDebugger is a graphical debugger for the scripting lenguage Tcl-TK.
Program.Description:
Graphical debugger for the scripting language Tcl-TK.
With RamDebugger, it is possible to make Local Debugging, where the debugger starts the program to be debugged. and Remote debugging, where the program to debug is already started and RamDebugger connects to it.
FEATURES
* IDE for code edition of TCL, XML and c/c++ * Full debugging of TCL and c/c++ * Works in Linux, Windows and MacOSX * It supports editing XML code * It contains a GUI for version control system (cvs or fossil)

Program.Name: vcs-ramdebugger
Program.ShortDescription: vcs-ramdebugger is a graphical interface for VCS systems like fossil or cvs.
Program.Description:
Graphical interface for version control systems like fossil or cvs
With vcs-ramdebugger, it is possible to update and commit files to VCS systems like fossil and CVS.
FEATURES
* Graphical tree like interface * Supports only most common operations: update, commit, add, remove, ... * It does not support creating or cloning the repository, nor opening the files
Program.NewsInVersion: * First version independent from RamDebugger
